snippet: A proposal by Dave Camp of the House Ways and Means Committee would change the way derivatives are taxed and the way capital gains are calculated.
abstract: Floyd Norris High & Low Finance column cites proposal by Republican Rep Dave Camp of the House Ways and Means Committee that would make substantial changes in taxation of financial instruments; points out that it would change the way derivatives are taxed and the way capital gains are calculated; suggests proposal may be a fresh start to reaching consensus on tax reform.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by Dave Camp of the House Ways and Means Committee would change the way derivatives are taxed and the way capital gains are calculated.

headline.seo: Congressman’s Proposal Is a First Step Toward a Tax Overhaul

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: House Committee on Ways and Means
